description:
Nitro PDF Pro is an application used to create, edit, sign, and secure PDF files and digital documents.


Fixed Issues & Improvements
Improved PDF/A Compliance & Expanded Archival Format Support
- Nitro PDF Pro 14.42 delivers a major upgrade to its PDF/A engine. The core conformance library has been updated to ensure more reliable, standards-aligned PDF/A output after conversion, and Nitro now supports the full family of PDF/A-3 variants:
  - PDF/A-3a
  - PDF/A-3b
  - PDF/A-3u
- The expanded PDF/A-3 support significantly increases Nitro's compatibility with modern archival, accessibility, and document-exchange standards and empowers users to create archival-grade PDFs with embedded data, accessibility, and enhanced search-ability.
Stability & Reliability
- Crash prevention improvements:
  - Added robust memory checks to prevent rare crashes when rendering large or complex images.
  - Fixed a crash that occurred when editing documents with corrupt page trees — the app now handles such files gracefully without crashing.
- Improved error handling:
  - Fixed scenarios where documents could become locked and undeletable after failed PDF/A conversions.
  - Resolved two issues that previously prevented successful FDF data imports for documents with template pages or nested form fields.
- Display & character handling:
  - Fixed corruption issues when editing documents containing Macron characters (used in Māori and similar languages).
  - Annotations with Chinese or other non-Latin text now display and can be edited correctly in Adobe Acrobat.
Compatibility & Feature Enhancements
- Annotation standardization:
  - Corrected a minor spec typo in text annotation intent (FreeTextTypeWriter), improving compatibility with third-party viewers like MuPDF. Backward compatibility with older annotations is maintained.
- Signature handling:
  - Improved consistency by displaying signer names only from the certificate, ensuring accuracy even when annotations contain inconsistent data.
- Redaction enhancements:
  - Refined overlay text behavior:
    - Fixed font sizing logic for "Auto" mode to ensure text fully fits within the redaction area.
    - Disabled "Repeat text" when auto-sizing is enabled.
Security & Compliance
- Updated core components: Upgraded the FreeType library to v2.14.1, addressing known vulnerabilities.
- Enhanced registry protection: Closed a potential loophole where URLs could be injected via registry keys.
- Safer timestamp handling: Fixed parsing issues for timestamps from Entrust timestamp servers, ensuring signature verification consistency.
Cloud & Integration Improvements
- iManage integration:
  - Added options to follow redirections in all iManage calls.
  - Introduced new feature flag imanage.redirect_to_default_if_wrong_server for flexible connection handling.
  - Fixed an issue that caused auto-tagging to fail when opening documents from iManage remote storage.
- SharePoint integration:
  - Streamlined auto-tagging workflow to reduce redundant confirmation prompts during document opening.
UX & Productivity Enhancements
- Batch processing: The "Ask before overwriting an existing file" option is now enabled by default, helping users avoid accidental data loss.
- UI consistency:
  - Disabled drag-and-drop reordering in the signature tree to prevent confusion.
  - Exposed the former skip_image_merge registry option in the Printer Preferences UI, improving accessibility for power users.
Internal & Engineering Improvements
- Fixed internal build job failures and removed redundant dependencies to simplify maintenance.
- Added new automated test coverage to strengthen regression protection for future updates.
